question: The famous Guru Gobind Basu v. Sankari Prasad Ghosal & others case is related to which of the following matters?
option1: Holding simultaneous elections to the House of People and State Legislative Assemblies
option2: Amendment in the Impeachment procedure of Judges
option3: Decisive test for Office of Profit
option4: Decriminalising Section 377 of the Indian Penal Code
answer: Decisive test for Office of Profit
explanation: Guru Gobind Basu v. Sankari Prasad Ghosal & others case is related to the definition of “Office of Profit”. In this case, the Supreme Court ruled the test for determining whether a person holds an office of profit or not. It includes several factors such as appointing authority, the authority vested with the power to terminate the appointment, the authority that determines the remuneration, the source of remuneration and the power that comes with the position have to be considered.
